headline: Did FTSE Index Removal Just Shift Eastman Chemical's (EMN) Investment Narrative?
summary: Eastman Chemical Company was recently removed from the FTSE All-World Index, prompting potential shifts in ownership by index-tracking investors. This type of index exclusion often results in portfolio rebalancing, which can impact liquidity and the overall shareholder base for the company. We'll explore how Eastman Chemical's removal from the index could influence its investment narrative and long-term market perception. Rare earth metals are the new gold rush.
